climatePledgeFriendly.details: Cradle to Cradle Certified products are made with safer materials and responsible processes to positively impact people and our planet. SILVER ACHIEVEMENT LEVEL

features: [ HYALURONIC ACID MOISTURIZER ] With hyaluronic acid, ceramides and MVE technology for 24 hour hydration. Rich, velvety texture that leaves skin feeling smooth, it is absorbed quickly for softened skin without greasy, sticky, feel.

[ MOISTURIZER FOR DRY SKIN ] A deficiency of ceramides in skin can often be associated with dry skin, which can feel itchy and look flaky. CeraVe Moisturizing Cream is formulated with three essential ceramides & hyaluronic acid.

[ GENTLE DAILY MOISTURIZER ] For face and body or can be used as a hand cream for dry skin relief. Holds National Eczema Association (NEA) Seal of Acceptance. Fragrance free, paraben free, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier.
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.
body.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Moisturizing Cream has a unique formula that provides 24-hour hydration and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1,3,6-II) and hyaluronic acid. This rich, non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula is ideal for sensitive skin on both the face and body Featuring our patented MVE Technology to release a steady stream of moisturizing ingredients throughout the day and night.•Non-comedogenic•Fragrance-free•Oil-free•Hypoallergenic•Gentle, non-irritating formula•Suitable for sensitive skinKey Ingredients:•MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier•Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Rich Moisturizing Cream for Dry Skin CeraVe Moisturizing Cream is non-comedogenic and has a rich texture, leaving skin feeling smooth and hydrated. How to Use Apply liberally as often as needed, or as directed by a physician. Suitable for use on the face, body, even hands. Developed with dermatologists All CeraVe products are developed with dermatologists. Moisturizing Cream is formulated without fragrance and oil and is allergy tested. The National Eczema Association Seal of Acceptance only accepts products that have satisfied the criteria for use for those with eczema or sensitive skin conditions. Hyaluronic Acid, Ceramides, MVE Technology Formulated with Hyaluronic Acid to help retain skin’s natural moisture, 3 Essential Ceramides to help restore & maintain the skin’s natural moisture barrier, and MVE Technology to provide long lasting continuous hydration.

Hydrating Facial Cleanser Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum Moisturizing Cream Hydrating Sheer Sunscreen Skin Type Normal to Very Dry Skin Normal to Dry Skin Dry Skin All Skin Types Benefit Cleanses, hydrates, and helps restore the protective skin barrier Replenishes skin hydration when helping restore the protective skin barrier Moisturizes and helps restore the protective skin barrier Hybrid face & body sunscreen to absorb and reflect the sun's damaging rays plus three essential ceramides to help restore skin’s natural barrier. Texture Non-foaming, creamy texture Smooth, gel-cream texture Rich, creamy texture Lightweight, clear finish

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING for patchy, dry skin!!
reviews.reviewText: This southern gal has struggled badly with dry skin since I had to move to a much colder climate, especially during the colder months! I get dry flaky skin on my hands and my legs especially; on my legs it is so bad that sometimes I cannot help scratching until it bleeds, or leaves a rash. I even do it in my sleep. It is... not my favorite thing.This product specifically - the moisturizing cream - is a lifesaver for me. Since using it, I no longer have the above issues with my skin. It does not smell like anything, is not at all greasy (my fave thing about it!!), feels thick while going on light and smooth, and ACTUALLY moisturizes. It's not meant for scent or cosmetic purposes. It truly leaves me with a deep moisturize that puts my dry, inflamed skin to rest. it is the only product I can swear by using for moisturizing my body. I have not used it much on my face, but I believe it is light and clean enough to do so :)Even better, my skin is sensitive to shaving and I sometimes get razor burn. If I apply this immediately after my shower, I do not get razor burn, and no uncomfortable itchy or burning sensations!Highly recommend for dry skin girlies especially during the cold months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and good product
reviews.reviewText: This tub is HUGE and well worth it for the quality plus price! Good for my sensitive skin - didn't break me out at all and kept me well-moisturized in the dry winter months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No issues for mature sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Over the years, I have tried various facial moisturizers, and have to say that I’m really happy with this one. I am 50, and have always had sensitive skin that dries out and flakes in the winter months. My fingers crack in the cold as well.This cream isn’t greasy, absorbs very well, goes great under makeup, and has caused no adverse reactions whatsoever, and I use it on my face, neck and under eye area every morning and night after washing my face with Alaffia black soap and using Thayer’s alcohol free toner. It also works well on my hands and body but I have always had more difficulty finding a facial product that works sans any negative side effects. Furthermore, my husband, who has a LOT of allergies and product sensitivities, and struggles with finding good personal care products has also used it successfully on his face.Nothing but satisfaction from me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a really good moisturizer! A little goes a long way, therefore it is a very good value. Love the very light scent. Love how smooth my skin feels after applying. Will continue to buy this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Keeps skin moisturized much longer than other brands. Not sure if it improves skin at all, or if it just feels better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, poor shipping and packaging
reviews.reviewText: This product is great. I have dry skin on my face and it helps a lot. Goes on easy, remaining residue on hands can be rubbed in and you can start touching stuff right away. Not much of a scent to it, so that is a plus for me.The shipping for this was bad. It was loose in the shipping box with other things. The container itself has no seal, so I'm just assuming it was the same inside as it was in the factory and nothing was put in there in transit. The lid came off at the slightest touch when picking it up from the box. Luckily this stuff isn't liquid, so nothing spilled out into the rest of the box. The cream itself seems normal and the same as it was when purchased at a retail store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cerave the BEST
reviews.reviewText: My very dry skin finally got the help it needed! I have tried every type of lotion for my dry skin. It’s a shame finally at 70 years old I have found the best results ever with Cerave. The cream works better than the lotion, it’s not sticky, gummy or heavy feeling. I would recommend this product for anyone who has dry flaky skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Non greasy moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: After using this cream for over half a year, I can say it has definitely helped my dry hands. The best qualities for me, aside from it actually softening my hands and arms, is how nontoxic it is. Unlike many other brands, I don’t end up with itchy sweaty hands after applying this. It absorbs wonderfully and I don’t have the need to wash my palms due to feeling oily. Instead with this cream they are just left feeling soft. Definitely recommend this for those with dry and sensitive skin.
Muyy buena crema, superHidratante, la uso con un adulto mayor (94 años)Mantiene su piel hidratada a pesar de lo delgado de su piel..

reviews.reviewTitle: Ottima crema corpo, CeraVe una garanzia
reviews.reviewText: CeraVe resta una garanzia per quanto riguarda la qualità dei prodotti per la cura di pelle e corpo.Questa crema è ottima per mantenere la pelle morbida e idratata, specie per chi soffre di secchezza e acne. Dopo diversi mesi posso assicurare che funziona molto meglio di tante altre marche (che non mi hanno dato sollievo).La consistenza è molto piacevole, morbida e vellutata, molto piacevole al tatto, si spalma con facilità e non lascia le mani eccessivamente unte. Ha ingredienti di qualità, non tossici e non ha praticamente odore, cosa molto importante per chi come me ha un olfatto sviluppato o preferisce mantenere il profumo di altri prodotti usati nella routine.La migliore sul mercato? Non azzarderei, ma il prezzo è decisamente migliore rispetto ad altre marche più note e costose (è comunque un prodotto L'Oréal, quindi alta qualità)Questa versione da 539g può risultare comoda per chi ne usa molta tutti i giorni, tuttavia il prezzo per grammo è più alto rispetto alle altre confezioni. Consiglio di scegliere le versioni più piccole se vogliamo risparmiare qualcosina o se dobbiamo portarla in viaggio.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to apply and moisturizes well.Great for daily use both D-N.
